stories.text: For me personally, I spoke to a few people but it mostly dies after a conversation or so (if we get to that). Wondering what the experience has been in general with the co-founder matching tool.

stories.text:
Hi there, bright minded you! If you're an owner/manager of a software development company and you've got experience partnering with nearshore/offshore devs, I'd love to learn about how it went down:

1) why did you decide to do it? 2) what did you like about it? 3) what didn't you like about it?
